text: Namah is a 2008 album by Slovakian composer Peter Machajdík. Performers on the album include singer Jon Anderson, vocalist and drummer David Moss, Italian harpist Floraleda Sacchi, cellists Jozef Lupták and Darry Dolezal, cymbalom player Enikö Ginzery, clarinetist Guido Arbonelli, pianist Mayuko Kida Takine, Icarus Quartet, and others. ==Track list== # She Will Be Picked by Herself # Namah # Nell'autunno del suo abbraccio insonne # Sadness Of Flowing (featuring Jon Anderson) # To the Rainbow so Close Again # Painting # Obscured Temptations # Water Forgives # Lullaby # 05.12.07. ==References== == External links == * Peter Machajdik Official Web Site * * An interview with Peter Machajdík Category:2008 albums Category:Peter Machajdík albums
title: Namah (album)
